Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
This main class creates and initialises all the others: it creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts the game. It also evaluates and executes the commands that the parser returns.

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • createRooms

      private static void createRooms()
      Create all the rooms and link their exits together.

    • play

      public static void play()
      Main play routine. Loops until end of play.

    • printWelcome

      private static void printWelcome()
      Print out the opening message for the player.

    • processCommand

      private static boolean processCommand(Command command)
      Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to be processed.
      Returns:
      true If the command ends the game, false otherwise.

    • printHelp

      private static void printHelp()
      Print out some help information. Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.

    • goRoom

      private static void goRoom(Command command)
      Try to go in one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new room, otherwise print an error message.

    • eat

      private static void eat(Command command)
      A method called by the player, attempts to consume an item from their inventory
      Parameters:
      command - the two phrases entered by the player to execute the command, in this case "eat" and the item to eat

    • pickup

      private static void pickup(Command command)
      A method called by the player, attempts to pickup an item from within a room
      Parameters:
      command - the two phrases entered by the player to execute the command, in this case "pickup" and the item to pickup

    • examine

      private static void examine(Command command)
      A method called by the player, attempts to print the description of the item requested by the player
      Parameters:
      command - the two phrases entered by the player to execute the command, in this case "examine" and the item to examine

    • search

      private static void search()
      A method called by the player, lists all items and enemies within the room they are currently in
      Parameters:
      args - Unused

    • wield

      private static void wield(Command command)
      A method called by the player, attempts to have the player wield a requested item from within their inventory
      Parameters:
      command - the two phrases entered by the player to execute the command, in this case "wield" and the item to wield

    • attack

      private static void attack(Command command)
      A method called by the player, attempts to attack a requested enemy in the room using the item they are currently wielding, then causes the attacked enemy to retaliate. If the attacked enemy dies, they are removed from the room and their loot (if any) is added to the player's inventory
      Parameters:
      command - the two phrases entered by the player to execute the command, in this case "attack" and the enemy to attack

    • drop

      private static void drop(Command command)
      A method called by the player, attempts to remove a requested item from their inventory, and add it to whichever room they are currently in
      Parameters:
      command - the two phrases entered by the player to execute the command, in this case "drop" and the item to drop

    • evade

      private static void evade()
      A method called by the player, recovers health and evades enemy attacks for one "turn" at the cost of hunger
      Parameters:
      args - Unused

    • enemyPhase

      private static void enemyPhase()
      A method called by several other methods, namely drop() and pickup(), that causes a random enemy in the room to attack the player
      Parameters:
      args - Unused

    • quit

      private static boolean quit(Command command)
      "Quit" was entered. Check the rest of the command to see whether we really quit the game.
      Returns:
      true, if this command quits the game, false otherwise.
